title: Calories in Twisted Tea
meta_description: Discover calories in twisted tea per 12 oz serving, including carbs, sugars, and other nutrition facts for Original flavor, plus tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Original Twisted Tea, 5% ABV, 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, serving size, and any added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz serving of Twisted Tea Original provides 145 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Twisted Tea?
faqs.a: About 145 kcal in a 12 oz serving of Original Twisted Tea.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Twisted Tea?
faqs.a: 14 g carbs per 12 oz serving, all from sugars with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does Twisted Tea have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's primarily carbs and alcohol.

faqs.q: Calories in Twisted Tea Light vs Original?
faqs.a: Light has ~115 kcal per 12 oz, 30 kcal less than Original.

faqs.q: How does serving size affect calories in Twisted Tea?
faqs.a: Calories scale with volume; a 16 oz serving would be ~193 kcal.
